Enter WhiteFox

She had been in stasis for a long time.  She had been on the planet 
since the arrival of the first transformers. Her maximal form had 
been suspended in a half bot, half artic fox mode.  Her proccesses in 
becoming a maximal had only been half complete. The change proccesses 
had not been able to finish the transformation. Her bot form looked 
more like a rotting corpse with animal pelt hanging off it than a 
what it was intended to look like. And untill now, her pod had been 
buried under tons of snow and ice. Now, for the first time, the ice  
was giving way.  CRASH!  A large chunk of ice broke off from the  
glacier and fell into the cold sea of the north pole. Her pod, still 
entombed in the ice, floated along as part of a very large iceberg. 
Drifting lazily with the sea's currents, the pod's distress becon 
beeped on. Extremely faint, but the becon could be picked up if the 
bot were only a few miles away.
